summary: This module serves as the central public interface of the aiohttp web framework, aggregating and re‑exporting core classes, utilities, and helpers needed to build asynchronous HTTP servers. It provides the Application container, request and response abstractions, routing definitions, middleware support, static file handling, WebSocket support, and runner/site mechanisms for launching the server, along with a command‑line entry point for quick execution.
business_intent: To simplify the development of high‑performance, non‑blocking web applications in Python by offering a cohesive, easy‑to‑use API for defining routes, handling requests, managing middleware, serving static content, and running the server infrastructure.
